entries.journal_entry_description: A series of tasks for Alik Lomax, the expert marksman who is teaching you about ranged combat.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Alik Lomax has asked you to reduce the population of dalyrakes that are destroying valueable plants in the greenhouse.  He asks that you get rid of 5 of them.
entries.task01_message_box_text: An important thing to remember with ranged combat is that you can use auto-attack.  To autofire with your weapon simply hold down the CTRL key and left-click on an attack in your Activities Bar.  This will cause the attack to go off continuously, every time it's charged, until either you or your opponent is defeated.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Alik and inform him that you have completed his task.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Droids have gone crazy and the station needs help containing them.  Destroy 10 ra7 droids
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Alik and inform him that you have completed his task.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Roughneck smugglers have broken into a cargobay, help the gurads stop them by killing 10 of them.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Return to Alik and inform him that you've completed your task.
